snippet: A man with a long criminal history shot five people, two fatally, during a spree before being apprehended Friday near the Canadian border, the police said.
abstract: Anthony Lord is arrested in Houlton, Maine, and charged with murder and kidnapping; is suspected of shooting five people, two fatally, assaulting one other person, stealing weapons and two vehicles and starting barn fire in nightlong crime spree.
lead_paragraph: A man with a long criminal history shot five people, two fatally, during a spree before being apprehended Friday near the Canadian border, the police said.

headline.main: Maine: Ex-Convict Arrested in Rampage That Killed Two
headline.print_headline: Maine: Ex-Convict Arrested in Rampage That Killed Two
